wat*id*o<AZL>r nE<GER>dEr wat*o'ma<RBM>r y@hwA<AZL>h Y@bA'<GER>w^ot 'im=rA'o<MER>h tir@'E<MUN>h | b*A<SIL>`<HQA>ni<MUN>y '<HPA>mAtE<RBM>kA w*z@kar@t*a<AZL>niy<PAS> w@lo<SIL>'=tiS@k*a<MUN>x 'Et='<HPA>mAtE<ZQP>kA w@nA<SIL>tat*A<MER>h la'<HPA>mA<SIL>t@kA<TIP> zE<MUN>ra` '<HPA>nASi<ATN>ym w*n@tat*i<MEH>yw la<SIL>yhwAh<PAS> k*Al=y@me<MUN>y xay*A<ZQP>yw w*mw^orA<TIP>h lo<SIL>'=ya`<HPA>lE<MER>h `al=ro'S<SIL>w^o:
w@hAyAh<PAS> k*i<MUN>y hir@b*@tA<ZQP>h l@hit@p*al*e<TIP>l lip@ne<MUN>y y@hwA<ATN>h w@`eli<TIP>y Some<MER>r 'Et=p*i<SIL>yhA:
w@xan*A<RBM>h hi<YET>y' m@dab*E<MUN>rEt `al=lib*A<ZQP>h* ra<YET>q W@pAtE<MUN>yhA n*A`<ZQP>w^ot w@qw^olA<TIP>h* lo<MUN>' yiW/*.Ame<ATN>`a way*ax@S@bE<MER>hA `eli<TIP>y l@Sik*orA<SIL>h:
way*o<MEH>'mEr 'elE<AZL>yhA<PAS> `eli<ZQP>y `ad=mAta<TIP>y t*iS@t*ak*Ari<ATN>yn hAsi<MER>yriy 'Et=yeyne<TIP>k@ me<SIL>`AlA<SIL>yik@:

wat*a<AZL>`an xan*A<MEH>h wat*o<AZL>'mEr<PAS> lo<MUN>' '<HPA>doni<ZQP>y 'iW/*.A<MEH>h q@Sat=r<AZL>w*xa<PAS> 'Ano<ZQP>kiy w@ya<MER>yin w@SekA<TIP>r lo<MUN>' SAti<ATN>ytiy wA<SIL>'ES@p*o<MER>k@ 'Et=nap@Si<TIP>y lip@ne<MER>y y@hwA<SIL>h:
'al=t*it*en<PAS> 'Et='<HPA>mA<MUN>t@kA<ZQP> lip@ne<TIP>y b*at=b*@liy*A<ATN>`al k*i<SIL>y=mero<MER>b Wiyxi<TEB>y w@ka`@si<TIP>y d*ib*a<MER>r@t*iy `ad=he<SIL>n*Ah:
way*a<DAR>`an `eli<TEB>y way*o<TIP>'mEr l@ki<MUN>y l@SAl<ATN>w^om we<SIL>'lohe<MUN>y yiW@rA'e<RBM>l yit*en<PAS> 'Et=Se<MUN>lAte<ZQP>k@ '<HPA>SE<MER>r SA'a<TIP>l@t*@ me<SIL>`im*<SIL>w^o:
wat*o<ZQM>'mEr t*im@YA<DAR>' Sip@xA<SIL>t@kA<TEB> xe<TIP>n b*@`eynE<ATN>ykA wat*e<AZL>lEk@ hA<SIL>'iW/*.A<MEH>h l@dar@k*Ah*<PAS> wat*o'ka<ZQP>l w*pAnE<MER>yhA lo'=hA<SIL>yw*=lA<TIP>h* `<SIL>w^od:

way*aS@k*i<MUN>mw* bab*o<RBM>qEr way*i<SIL>S@t*ax<HPA>ww*<PAS> lip@ne<MUN>y y@hwA<ZQP>h way*ASu<TEB>bw* way*Abo<MER>'w* 'El=b*eytA<TIP>m hA<SIL>rAmA<ATN>tAh way*e<MEH>da` 'El@qAnAh<PAS> 'Et=xan*A<MUN>h 'iS@t*<ZQP>w^o wa<SIL>y*iz@k*@rE<TIP>hA y@hwA<SIL>h:
wa<SIL>y@hiy<PAS> lit@qup<MUN>w^ot hay*Ami<ZQP>ym wat*a<MER>har xan*A<TIP>h wat*e<MUN>lEd b*e<ATN>n wat*iq@rA<MEH>' 'Et=S@mw^o<PAS> S@mw*'e<ZQP>l k*i<MER>y me<SIL>y@hwA<TIP>h S@'il@t*i<SIL>yw:
way*a<TEB>`al hA'i<MER>yS 'El@qAnA<TIP>h w@kAl=b*eyt<ATN>w^o liz@b*o<DAR>xa la<SIL>yhwA<TEB>h 'Et=zE<MER>bax hay*Ami<TIP>ym w@'Et=nid@r<SIL>w^o:

w@xan*A<TIP>h lo<MUN>' `AlA<ATN>tAh k*i<SIL>y='Am@rA<MUN>h l@'iySA<RBM>h* `a<MUN>d yig*Ame<MEH>l han*a<AZL>`ar<PAS> wah<HPA>bi<SIL>'oti<RBM>yw w@nir@'Ah<PAS> 'Et=p*@ne<MUN>y y@hwA<ZQP>h w@yA<MER>Sab SA<TIP>m `ad=`w^olA<SIL>m:

way*o<MUN>'mEr lAh*<TLP> 'El@qAnA<AZL>h 'iySA<GER>h* `<HPA>Wi<DAR>y haT*<MUN>w^ob b*@`eyna<RBM>yik@ S@biy<PAS> `ad=g*Am@le<MUN>k@ 'ot<ZQP>w^o 'a<TEB>k@ yAqe<MER>m y@hwA<TIP>h 'Et=d*@bAr<ATN>w^o wat*e<MEH>SEb hA<SIL>'iW/*.Ah<PAS> wat*e<MUN>ynEq 'Et=b*@nA<ZQP>h* `ad=gAm@lA<TIP>h* 'ot<SIL>w^o:

wat*a<SIL>`<HPA>le<AZL>hw* `im*A<GER>h* k*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MUN>r g*@mAla<RBM>t*w* b*@pAri<MEH>ym S@loSAh<PAS> w@'eypA<AZL>h 'axa<MER>t qE<AZL>max<PAS> w@ne<MUN>bEl ya<ZQP>yin wat*@bi'e<MER>hw* beyt=y@hwA<TIP>h Sil<ATN>w^o w@han*a<TIP>`ar nA<SIL>`ar:
wa<SIL>y*iS@x<HPA>T<TIP>w* 'Et=hap*A<ATN>r way*Abi<MER>'w* 'Et=han*a<TIP>`ar 'El=`eli<SIL>y:

wat*o<AZL>'mEr<PAS> b*i<MUN>y '<HPA>doni<ZQP>y xe<MER>y nap@S@kA<TIP> '<HPA>doni<ATN>y '<HPA>ni<MUN>y hA<SIL>'iW/*.A<RBM>h han*iY*E<MEH>bEt `im*@kAh<PAS> b*AzE<ZQP>h l@hit@p*al*e<TIP>l 'El=y@hwA<SIL>h:
'El=han*a<MER>`ar haz*E<TIP>h hit@p*al*A<ATN>l@t*iy way*it*e<AZL>n y@hwA<MER>h liy<PAS> 'Et=S@'e<MUN>lAti<ZQP>y '<HPA>SE<MER>r SA'a<TIP>l@t*iy me<SIL>`im*<SIL>w^o:

w@ga<MUN>m 'A<SIL>noki<RBM>y hiS@'il@t*i<AZL>hw*<PAS> la<SIL>yhwA<ZQP>h k*Al=hay*Amiym<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MUN>r hAyA<ZQP>h h<MER>w*' SA'<TIP>w*l la<SIL>yhwA<ATN>h way*iS@t*a<MER>xw* SA<TIP>m la<SIL>yhwA<SIL>h:

'eyn=qAd<MER>w^oS k*a<SIL>yhwA<TIP>h k*i<MUN>y 'e<MUN>yn b*il@t*E<ATN>kA w@'e<MER>yn Y<TIP>w*r k*e<SIL>'lohe<SIL>ynw*:
'al=t*ar@b*<MEH>w* t@dab*@rw*<PAS> g*@bohA<MUN>h g@bohA<ZQP>h yeYe<MER>' `AtA<TIP>q mip*iykE<ATN>m k*i<MUN>y 'e<MEH>l d*e`w^ot<PAS> y@hwA<ZQP>h wl' (w@l<MER>w^o) nit@k*@n<TIP>w* `<HPA>lil<SIL>w^ot:
qE<MER>SEt g*ib*ori<TIP>ym xat*i<ATN>ym w@nik@SAli<TIP>ym 'A<MER>z@rw* xA<SIL>yil:
W@be`i<MEH>ym b*al*E<AZL>xEm<PAS> niW@k*A<ZQP>rw* w*r@`ebi<TIP>ym xAde<ATN>l*w* `ad=`<HPA>qArAh<PAS> yA<SIL>l@dA<MUN>h Sib@`A<ZQP>h w@rab*a<MER>t b*Ani<TIP>ym 'um@lA<SIL>lAh:

rag@le<MEH>y x<HPA>siydAw<PAS> yiS@mo<ZQP>r w*r@SA`i<TIP>ym b*axo<MUN>SEk@ yid*A<ATN>m*w* k*iy=lo<MER>' b@ko<TIP>xa yig@b*ar='i<SIL>yS:

y@hwA<GAR>h yexa<MUN>t*w* m@riybA<RBM>w `AlAw<PAS> b*aW/*.Ama<MUN>yim yar@`e<ZQP>m y@hwA<TIP>h yAdi<MUN>yn 'ap@sey='A<ATN>rEY w@yit*En=`o<MUN>z l@mal@k*<ZQP>w^o w@yAre<TIP>m qE<MER>rEn m@Siyx<SIL>w^o:
way*e<DAR>lEk@ 'El@qAnA<TEB>h hA<SIL>rAmA<TIP>tAh `al=b*eyt<ATN>w^o w@han*a<RBM>`ar hAyA<MEH>h m@SAret<PAS> 'Et=y@hwA<ZQP>h 'Et=p*@ne<TIP>y `eli<MER>y hak*ohe<SIL>n:
w*b@ne<MER>y `eli<TIP>y b*@ne<MUN>y b@liy*A<ATN>`al lo<MER>' yA<SIL>d@`<TIP>w* 'Et=y@hwA<SIL>h:

w*miS@p*a<MER>T hak*o<SIL>h<HPA>ni<TIP>ym 'Et=hA`A<ATN>m k*Al='i<GAR>yS zobe<MUN>xa zE<RBM>bax w*bA<AZL>' na<MEH>`ar hak*ohen<PAS> k*@baW/*.e<MUN>l hab*AWA<ZQP>r w@ham*az@le<TEB>g S@lo<MER>S haW/*.in*a<TIP>yim b*@yAd<SIL>w^o:

w@hik*A<AZL>h bak*iy*<GER>w^or '<MUN>w^o bad*<RBM>w*d '<MEH>w^o baq*al*a<AZL>xat<PAS> '<MUN>w^o bap*Ar<ZQP>w*r k*o<YET>l '<HPA>SE<MUN>r ya<SIL>`<HPA>lE<MUN>h ham*az@le<ZQP>g yiq*a<MER>x hak*ohe<TIP>n b*<ATN>w^o k*A<YET>kAh ya<SIL>`<HPA>W<MUN>w* l@kAl=yiW@rA'e<ZQP>l hab*A'i<MER>ym SA<TIP>m b*@Silo<SIL>h:

g*am<ZIN> b*@TErEm<ZIN> yaq@Tir<MUN>w*n 'Et=haxelEb<AST> w*bA<MUN>' | na<MUN>`ar hak*ohe<RBM>n w@'Amar<PAS> lA'i<MUN>yS haz*obe<ZQP>xa t*@nA<MUN>h bAWA<ZQP>r liY@l<TIP>w^ot lak*ohe<ATN>n w@lo<SIL>'=yiq*a<DAR>x mim*@kA<TEB> b*AWA<MER>r m@buW/*.A<TIP>l k*i<MER>y 'im=xA<SIL>y:

way*o<AZL>'mEr 'elA<GER>yw hA'i<RBM>yS qaT*e<AZL>r yaq@Tiyr<MEH>w*n k*ay*w^om<PAS> haxe<ZQP>lEb w@qa<AZL>x=l@kA<ZQP> k*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MER>r t*@'aw*E<TIP>h nap@SE<ATN>kA w@'Ama<MER>r | lw (lo'<PAS>) k*i<YET>y `at*A<MUN>h tit*e<ZQP>n w@'im=lo<TIP>' lAqa<MER>x@t*iy b@xAz@qA<SIL>h:
wat*@hi<AZL>y xaT*a<DAR>'t han*@`Ari<TEB>ym g*@dw^olA<MER>h m@'o<TIP>d 'Et=p*@ne<MUN>y y@hwA<ATN>h k*i<MEH>y ni<SIL>'<HPA>Yw*<PAS> hA<SIL>'<HPA>nASi<ZQP>ym 'e<TIP>t min@xa<MER>t y@hwA<SIL>h:
w*S@mw*'e<ZQM>l m@SAre<TIP>t 'Et=p*@ne<MUN>y y@hwA<ATN>h na<ZQM>`ar xAg<TIP>w*r 'ep<MER>w^od b*A<SIL>d:

w*m@`i<MEH>yl qATon<PAS> t*a<SIL>`<HPA>WEh=l*<MUN>w^o 'im*<ZQP>w^o w@ha<SIL>`al@tA<MER>h l<TIP>w^o miy*Ami<MUN>ym | yAmi<ATN>ymAh b*a<SIL>`<HPA>lw^otAh*<PAS> 'Et='iySA<ZQP>h* liz@b*o<TIP>xa 'Et=zE<MER>bax hay*Ami<SIL>ym:

w*bera<AZL>k@ `eli<GER>y 'Et='El@qAnA<MUN>h w@'Et='iS@t*<RBM>w^o w@'Amar<PAS> yAWem<TLP> y@hwA<AZL>h l@kA<MER> zE<AZL>ra`<PAS> min=hA<SIL>'iW/*.A<MUN>h haz*o<ZQP>'t t*a<YET>xat haW/*.@'elA<ZQP>h '<HPA>SE<MER>r SA'a<TIP>l la<SIL>yhwA<ATN>h w@hA<SIL>l@k<TIP>w* lim@qw^om<SIL>w^o:
k*i<SIL>y=pAqa<MEH>d y@hwAh<PAS> 'Et=xan*A<ZQP>h wat*a<TEB>har wat*e<MER>lEd S@loSA<SIL>h=bAni<TIP>ym w*S@t*e<MUN>y bAn<ATN>w^ot way*ig@d*a<TEB>l han*a<MER>`ar S@mw*'e<TIP>l `im=y@hwA<SIL>h:

w@`eli<TIP>y zAqe<MUN>n m@'o<ATN>d w@SAma<RBM>` 'et<TLP> k*Al='<HPA>SE<AZL>r ya<SIL>`<HPA>W<MEH>w*n b*AnAyw<PAS> l@kAl=yiW@rA'e<ZQP>l w@'e<MEH>t '<HPA>SE<SIL>r=yiS@k*@bw*n<PAS> 'Et=han*ASi<ZQP>ym haY*o<MUN>b@'<ZQP>w^ot p*E<TIP>tax 'o<MER>hEl mw^o`e<SIL>d:

way*o<MUN>'mEr lAhE<ZQP>m lA<MER>m*Ah ta<SIL>`<HPA>W<TIP>w*n k*ad*@bAri<MUN>ym hA'e<ATN>l*Eh '<HPA>SE<AZL>r 'A<SIL>noki<MEH>y Some<AZL>`a<PAS> 'Et=d*ib@reykE<MUN>m rA`i<ZQP>ym me'e<TIP>t k*Al=hA`A<MER>m 'e<SIL>l*Eh:
'a<TIP>l b*AnA<ATN>y k*i<TLM>y l<SIL>w^o'=Tw^obA<MEH>h haW/*.@mu`Ah<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MUN>r 'A<SIL>noki<MUN>y Some<ZQP>`a ma<SIL>`<HPA>biri<TIP>ym `am=y@hwA<SIL>h:

'im=yE<SIL>x<HSE>TA<AZL>' 'i<MEH>yS l@'iyS<PAS> w*pi<SIL>l@l<MUN>w^o '<HSE>lohi<ZQP>ym w@'i<MEH>m la<SIL>yhwAh<PAS> yE<SIL>x<HSE>TA'='i<ZQP>yS mi<TIP>y yit@p*al*El=l<ATN>w^o w@lo<MEH>' yiS@m@`w*<PAS> l@q<MUN>w^ol '<HPA>biyhE<ZQP>m k*i<SIL>y=xApe<MER>Y y@hwA<TIP>h la<SIL>h<HPA>miytA<SIL>m:
w@han*a<MUN>`ar S@mw*'e<ZQP>l hole<MER>k@ w@gAde<TIP>l wAT<ATN>w^ob g*a<YET>m `im=y@hwA<ZQP>h w@ga<TIP>m `im='<HPA>nASi<SIL>ym:
